meanings.definition: A loyal and devoted supporter or member of a group or organization.
meanings.sent1: She is a trueblues of the school's basketball team, always cheering them on at every game.
meanings.sent2: The trueblues of the club never miss a meeting and are always there to help out.
meanings.sent3: The trueblues of the hiking group even climbed the mountain in the rain just to show their dedication.
meanings.sent4: His dog was his trueblues, always by his side no matter what.
meanings.sent5: The trueblues of the charity worked tirelessly to raise funds for those in need.
